title: Brownies (Rodelle)
instructions: 2. Prepare Pan: Line a 9x13-inch (23x33 cm) pan with parchment paper and spray lightly with cooking spray.
3. Melt Butter: Melt butter in a small saucepan and transfer to a large mixing bowl.
• Gradually add eggs, mixing thoroughly after each addition.
• Add Rodelle Cocoa Powder and mix.
• Gently stir in flour until combined.
• Fold in chocolate chips and nuts, if using.
5. Bake: Pour batter into prepared pan and bake for approximately 35 minutes. Do not overbake.
6. Cool and Serve: Allow brownies to cool completely in the pan. Turn onto a surface, peel off parchment paper, and cut into squares.
